custom.blockTitle: Just for you or with someone else?
How can we make your life Bett3r?

buttons.label_single: I would like to set up a new deposit account
buttons.label_joint: We would like to set up a new deposit account

buttons.label_single: I would like to set up a new offset account on an existing eligble AMP home loan
buttons.label_joint: We would like to set up a new offset account on an existing eligible AMP home loan

options.label: One-off payment (e.g. matured investment, court settlement, redundancy, inheritance)
One-off payment (e.g. matured investment, court settlement, redundancy, inheritance)
Government benefits (e.g. childcare rebate, family tax benefit)
Everyday banking e.g. regular deposits and withdrawals for everyday expenses
Business income e.g. regular deposits and withdrawals for expenses (mostly for non-individuals)
Savings e.g. regular deposits with few withdrawals, earning interest to grow your balance
Building wealth e.g. large initial deposit, using investment returns to grow your wealth over time
